docs.lead_paragraph: A growing field of opportunity for otherwise untrained middle-aged women is revealed in the merging of two WPA projects in New York City.- It is a free housekeeping service for chronically ill and aged persons, sponsored jointly by the Mayor and the Department of Hospitals and carried on in cooperation with the Henry Street Nursing Service and the Committee on Chronic Illness of the Welfare Council.

headline.main: AIDES FOR HOMES OF THE ILL; WPA Project Merger Provides Services by Middle-Aged Women on Relief Other Similar Services Taken From Relief Rolls Health Aspect First In All Kinds of Homes

docs.abstract: Aids WPA housekeeping service; scope and aims described
